review: First I would like to say this is a good product, but I sugguest to anyone make sure you do a lot of research before you purchase this item. Some things I found out is that although it states Showtime and HBO can be viewed they only offer select cables networks. Another thing to be aware of is to make sure you have the Internet capability to operate the device effectively. I had the wifi capability, buy when you have multitble devices; such as iPads it does do work well without turning the wifi off of those devices. I did that and it still needed to buff every 10-15 minutes. I was able to get support and that is how I found that information out, but it still not not work. Needless to say it took away from the enjoyment of the device.This device is NOT compatible with Comcast.
